Title: RIA Services - Query Serializer
Description:
The ExpressionSerializationForRiaServices is a library which contains  Expression serializer and deserializer. 
I use the library in case, when I have a query as a parameter in my RIA Services.
HomeWiki:
The ExpressionSerializationForRiaServices

is a library which contains Expression serializer and deserializer. There are versions of the library for Silverlight 3.0, Silverlight 4.0, Net.Framework 3.5 and Net.Framework 4.0.
I use the library in case, when I have a query as a parameter in my RIA Services.

Live demo is here
